name: Reading Room (VladimirKolkunov)
description:
The main character, as always, falls asleep at home, but wakes up in an unfamiliar place where he has never been before. Can you figure out what this place is and get out of there?

Controls:

WASD - Movement

Left Mouse Button - Interact

Tab - Inventory Open/Close

Space - Skip dialogue/cutscene

Languages:

Russian

English
